LanguageData.SkywrathController.label: Controlador Skywrath
LanguageData.SkywrathController.description: Un potente dispositivo controlador del tiempo. Es capaz de desencadenar la ira del cielo sobre sus enemigos.
LanguageData.SkywrathController_Blueprint.label: Skywrath controller (blueprint)
LanguageData.SkywrathController_Frame.label: Skywrath controller (building)
LanguageData.SkywrathController_Frame.description: A powerful weather controller device. It is able to unleash the sky's wrath on your ennemies.
